name: The Poly Project
description:
Made within 3 weeks for Virtual CodeDay!

https://codeday.org

Server List:
Official TPP Server: 158.69.193.29

I am planning on releasing this for free on the Discord Store.

I am open and considering all suggestions.

Please think about donating, server costs  and other costs come out of my own pocket.

To exit the game, you must use Alt+F4, I have not implemented anything for quitting yet.

Credits:

Synty Studios  - Assets (Paid)

Mirror - Networking

MrGadget on the Mirror Discord - Helping me with networking everything correctly.

You - For playing :)
